content: In 2012, however, when Marissa Mayer became CEO of Yahoo, she made revamping Flickr, especially on the mobile platform, a top priority and a redesign of the service occurred. The redesign focused on creating a similar user experience across platforms and had the challenge of figuring out how users could tag and search for photos, without reading and seeing a lot of text and words. Hence, the design placed more emphasis on images and photos.
